text: Grandma got her #COVID19 #vaccine dose today. Rarely leaving the house over the year it signifies a big moment & a glimmer of joy amidst a divided #Christmas which I will spend away from B & the family back home in the Midlands. #MerryChristmas everyone 🎧 https://t.co/7mlyluiyaM https://t.co/PYPzCtbT3o
